amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part C of House Report 111-126 to prohibit authorized funds from being used to name a project or program for an individual then serving as a Member, Delegate, Resident Commissioner, or Senator of the United States Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCaul amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 2 (Roll no. 289).
